TopicTitle: Issues With MODs and KSP Saves and New Games Loading

Articles.Content:
I am running KSP 0.90 Steam version on OSX Yosemite

After the update, I went to update my mod list as usual, but after adding in about a dozen mods, I discovered that KSP will not load a saved game or start a new one. Without mods, it works fine, but I cannot find the problem mod that is causing this issue.

mod list

USI Kolonizaition Systems

USI Kerbonite

USI Kerbonite Plus

USI ART

USI survival pack

USI exploration pack

USI Regolith

USI Warp Drive

USI Exploration Pack

USI AMT ( forget exactly which one this is )

USI Community Resource Pack

NEar Future Construction

Near Future Solar

Kerbal Alarm Clock

Alternate Resource Panel

Hyperedit

Stage REcovery

Station Science

D Magic Orbital Science

Infernal robotics

TweakScale

SmokeScreen

SCAN Sat

Real Chute

Taurus HCV

Procedural Fairings

Module RCSFX ( a sub mod from USI mods )

Module Manager 2.5.4

module manager cashe file

module manager config SHA file

Final Frontier

Final Frontier data file

Editor Extensions

Chatterer

Cross Feed Enabler

000 Toolbar

000 USI Tools

Active Texture Management 64 bit extreme version

Player.Log file

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/98ag023s0p7yajo/AAASRZttbR-D5rpyIo6GuHUVa?dl=0

As I said, I know one of these mods is causing me to be unable to load games, but do not know if its one or a combination. Thank you for the help.
I have the same problem, but unfortunately I have no idea how to solve. Its a mod obviosly, try getting rid of tweak scale

I found the bad mod. Of all things it was Final Frontier. After I removed it, I have had no issues and the game works normally. I would guess I either had a corrupted version or a bad download. Have not tried a fresh reinstall of FF yet though.
